export var CREATE_WIDGET='CREATE_WIDGET';export var DELETE_WIDGET='DELETE_WIDGET';export var FIND_ALL_WIDGETS_FOR_TOPIC='FIND_ALL_WIDGETS_FOR_TOPIC';export var UPDATE_WIDGET='UPDATE_WIDGET';export var MOVE_WIDGET_UP='MOVE_WIDGET_UP';export var MOVE_WIDGET_DOWN='MOVE_WIDGET_DOWN';export var SAVE_ALL_WIDGETS='SAVE_ALL_WIDGETS';export var createWidget=function createWidget(topicId,widgetId){return{name:'New Widget',widgetType:'Heading',id:widgetId,// id:(new Date()).getTime(), // TODO, replace with next id
topicId:topicId,type:CREATE_WIDGET};};export var deleteWidget=function deleteWidget(widgetId){return{type:DELETE_WIDGET,widgetId:widgetId};};export var findAllWidgetsForTopic=function findAllWidgetsForTopic(widgets){return{type:FIND_ALL_WIDGETS_FOR_TOPIC,widgets:widgets};};export var updateWidget=function updateWidget(widget){return{type:UPDATE_WIDGET,widget:widget};};export var moveWidgetUp=function moveWidgetUp(widget,other){return{type:MOVE_WIDGET_UP,widget:widget,other:other};};export var moveWidgetDown=function moveWidgetDown(widget,other){return{type:MOVE_WIDGET_DOWN,widget:widget,other:other};};export var saveAllWidgets=function saveAllWidgets(widgets){return{widgets:widgets,type:SAVE_ALL_WIDGETS};};export default{CREATE_WIDGET:CREATE_WIDGET,DELETE_WIDGET:DELETE_WIDGET,FIND_ALL_WIDGETS_FOR_TOPIC:FIND_ALL_WIDGETS_FOR_TOPIC,UPDATE_WIDGET:UPDATE_WIDGET,MOVE_WIDGET_UP:MOVE_WIDGET_UP,MOVE_WIDGET_DOWN:MOVE_WIDGET_DOWN,SAVE_ALL_WIDGETS:SAVE_ALL_WIDGETS,deleteWidget:deleteWidget,createWidget:createWidget,findAllWidgetsForTopic:findAllWidgetsForTopic,updateWidget:updateWidget,moveWidgetUp:moveWidgetUp,moveWidgetDown:moveWidgetDown,saveAllWidgets:saveAllWidgets};
